sqlMap.select: select count(1) as count from customer where name = #customername# and business_id=#businessId# and customer_id!=#customerId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into customer(name,active,date_created,timeZone,deleted,api_password, api_username, business_id, address_id, account_number, sales_agent, sales_agent2, payable_days, payment_type, payment_type_level, additional_handling_charge, credit_limit, monthly_spend, branch, default_currency,show_ref,chb_customer) values (#name#,#active#,#dateCreated#,#timeZone#,0,#apiPassword#,#apiUsername#, #businessId#, #addressId#, #accountNumber#, #salesAgent#, #salesAgent2#, #payableDays#, #paymentType#, #paymentTypeLevel#, #additionalHandlingCharge#, #creditLimit#, #monthlySpend#, #branch#, #defaultCurrency#,#reference#,#chbCustomer#) select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value

insert into customer_sales (customer_id,sales_user,comm_perc_ps, comm_perc_pp, comm_perc_chb) values (#customerId#,#salesAgent#,#commissionPercentagePerSkidService#, #commissionPercentagePerPalletService#, #commisionPercentagePerCHB#) select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.select:
select distinct c.* from customer c left join address a on (c.address_id=a.address_id) left join customer_carrier cc on (c.customer_id=cc.customer_id) left join customer_sales csu on (c.customer_id=csu.customer_id) where c.business_id = #businessId#
and c.name like '%$name$%'
and (c.account_number=#accountNumber# or cc.account_number1=#accountNumber# or cc.account_number2=#accountNumber#)
and csu.sales_user=#salesAgent#
and c.branch=#branch#
and (a.address1 like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.address2 like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.city like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.phone_no like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.email_address like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.contact_name like '%$addressSearchString$%' or a.postal_code like '%$addressSearchString$%')
select * from customer c where c.customer_id = #id#
